LOG_IN.TITLE: {es}Log in with your Admin Credentials.
LOG_IN.SUB_TITLE: {es}Take control of your health and well-beingwith Consent2Share.

WARNING_DIALOG.TITLE: {spanish} Terms of Use
WARNING_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: {spanish} NOTICE: The purpose of this system is to demonstrate the features of Consent2Share, using TEST DATA ONLY. Any use of REAL PATIENT DATA and/or patient identifying information will be a violation of state and federal privacy laws, specifically 42 CFR Part 2, HIPAA, and Title 38 and the user(s) may be subject to fines and/or imprisonment as defined under the enforcement rules of Office of Civil Rights.
WARNING_DIALOG.CHECKBOX: {spanish} I agree to the terms, and will not use real Patient Data or Identifying Information.

HOME.WELCOME_SUB_TITLE: {es}You are now ready to manage your users.

LIST.TITLE: {es}My Users
LIST.INFO: {es}OK! You are now ready to manage your users.
LIST.NO_PATIENTS_MSG: {es}There are currently no Users available. Please click the 'Create a User Account' button to create a new user.

CREATE_EDIT.INFO: {es}Please complete all required fields to create a User Account.

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: {es}Confirm Navigation
CONFIRM_DIALOG.CONTENT: {es}You will lose all unsaved work, Are you sure you want to leave this page?

CONTENT.LABEL: {es}Activate Account for:
CONTENT.RESENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: {es}An email has been sent and awaiting the patient to activate the account. Select the 'Send Email' button to re-send an account activation email.
CONTENT.SENT_VERIFICATION_CODE_MSG: {es}Select the 'Send Email' button to generate the Verification Code.Sending an account activation email to the address listed above will generate a unique Verification Code.

NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SENT_EMAIL: {es}Failed to send email, please try again later...
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_ENABLE_ACCOUNT: {es}Failed to enable user account, please try again later...
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_DISABLE_ACCOUNT: {es}Failed to disable account, please try again later...
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_SEARCH_PATIENT: {es}Failed to search patient, please try again later...
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_CREATE_PATIENT: {es}Failed to create patient, please try again later...
NOTIFICATION_MSG.FAILED_UPDATE_PATIENT: {es}Failed to update patient, please try again later...

SHARED.CONFIGURATION_SERVICE_ERROR: {spanish} Could not load configurations from the server. Please go to the Login Page and try again.

VALIDATION_RULES.EMAIL_ERROR_MESSAGE: {es}This email does not perform email validation.
VALIDATION_RULES.INVALID_PAST_DATE_ERROR_MESSAGE: {es}Selected date must be earlier than today
VALIDATION_RULES.NPIS_MATCH_MESSAGE: {es}Authorize and disclose NPIs must be different.
